title: Not My Job: E Street Drummer Max Weinberg Gets Quizzed On New Jersey
teaser: Peter Sagal has taken more than a few potshots at his home state over the years, so we'll quiz Weinberg, a proud son of Newark, on some of New Jersey's highlights. Originally broadcast Dec. 6, 2014.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
